description:
webNetwork Cloud Agent for the HP webOS platform allows Stoneware customers to securely access critical business information from their webNetwork private cloud using an HP webOS tablet device, such as the TouchPad.

Leveraging the device's WiFi/3G connectivity, users can securely access corporate reports, network file systems, applications, and content from anywhere, at anytime.

Stoneware's Cloud Agent for the HP webOS platform is a native application allowing users to single sign-on directly from the mobile device into the webNetwork cloud.  A list of available applications and services will be made available through the interface based on the user's network identity.

REQUIREMENT:  This is a CLIENT that requires users to be running Stoneware webNetwork 6.0.6.0 or higher.  For more information on Stoneware's webNetwork and webOS products, please go to http://www.stone-ware.com
